params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.is_final
params.description: Output only. If false, this StreamingTranslateSpeechResult represents an interim result that may change. If true, this is the final time the translation service will return this particular StreamingTranslateSpeechResult, the streaming translator will not return any further hypotheses for this portion of the transcript and corresponding audio.
